reviewText: This DVD is superbly done! Previous experience playing the piano is helpful, but Mr. Uhlmann has developed a method that is easy for anyone to follow and fun to practice. I highly recommend this item!

Robert Uhlmann has created a uniquely entertaining lesson plan for enlivening your parties and enchanting your friends with an easy-to-follow piano accompaniment for everyone's favorite songs -- turn your next party into a totally fun piano bar!
